ai-tha-ap496:0.3_0: What was the most senior monk deserving fire?
ai-tha-ap496:1.2_0: one should not raise joined palms to him.

ai-tha-ap496:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap496:4.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap496:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap496:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bakkula.
ai-tha-ap496:8.1_0: What’s the fourth full moon of flowers?
